channel.title: 317 RSPS exception after changing stats of a custom?
channel.description:
Hey, I just added a custom weapon into my client (added ints) and I made some stats for it in item.cfg. It compiles without errors, but when I try to run the server I get this:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112)
Any help would be appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: 317 RSPS exception after changing stats of a custom?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Yeah to a more suitable number. In the hypothetical situation let’s say you wanted to add an item that has the ID 15001 you should make the max limit like 16000 if you want to add more items later it won’t be a problem for a good while.

I’d tell you where the array is but I haven’t touched RSPS in a looong time. All it is, is changing one number.

Post and label the methods to do with
ItemHandler.java:283
ItemHandler.java:173
server.java:112
Number = what line in notepad you find the line by hitting ctrl + f (I think cba checking lol). Just post the whole methods, should look like a small paragraph with some indentation.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 RSPS exception after changing stats of a custom?

item.title: 317 RSPS exception after changing stats of a custom?
item.dc:creator: @awesomebro88 awesomebro88
item.description:
@awesomebro88 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:3, topic:519573”]Your array isn’t big enough, I’m not sure how to explain it but basically theirs a piece of code which says theirs lets say 15,000 items and you need to make it a higher number so that their can be more items than this hypothetical 15,000.

Or I remember this wrong and sk8r is correct however I’m pretty sure that error is because the array isn’t big enough.[/quote]
Meaning, you would have to change the piece of code that says there is 15,000 items?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Your array isn’t big enough, I’m not sure how to explain it but basically theirs a piece of code which says theirs lets say 15,000 items and you need to make it a higher number so that their can be more items than this hypothetical 15,000.

Or I remember this wrong and sk8r is correct however I’m pretty sure that error is because the array isn’t big enough.
